mapper.select: SELECT id, category, title, question, answer, keywords, updated_at, embedding FROM chatbot_knowledge WHERE question LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR answer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR keywords LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT id, category, title, question, answer, keywords, updated_at, embedding FROM chatbot_knowledge WHERE embedding IS NOT NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE chatbot_knowledge SET embedding = #{embedding}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, category, title, question, answer, keywords, updated_at, embedding FROM chatbot_knowledge WHERE MATCH(question, answer, keywords) AGAINST(#{keyword} IN BOOLEAN MODE) OR question LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR answer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR keywords LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT 20
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chatbot_knowledge (category, title, question, answer, keywords, embedding) VALUES (#{category}, #{title}, #{question}, #{answer}, #{keywords}, #{embedding})
